sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-table
    ref="multipleTable"
    :data="tableData"
    tooltip-effect="dark"
    style="width: 100%"
    :default-sort = "{prop: 'date', order: 'descending'}"
    @selection-change="handleSelectionChange">
    <el-table-column
      type="selection"
      width="55">
    </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column
      prop="date"
      label="日期"
      width="120"
      sortable>
      <template slot-scope="scope">{{ scope.row.date }}</template>
    </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column
      prop="title"
      label="标题"
      width="120"
      sortable>
    </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column
      prop="author"
      label="作者"
      sortable
      show-overflow-tooltip>
    </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column
      fixed="right"
      label="操作"
      width="200">
      <template slot-scope="scope">
        <el-button @click="handleClick(scope.row)" size="small">查看</el-button>
        <el-button size="small">编辑</el-button>
      </template>
    </el-table-column>
  </el-table>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'ArticleList',
  data () {
    return {
      tableData: [{
        date: '2016-05-03',
        title: '今天天气好1',
        author: '大哥'
      }, {
        date: '2016-05-02',
        title: '今天天气好2',
        author: '大哥2'
      }, {
        date: '2016-05-04',
        title: '今天天气好',
        author: '大哥3'
      }, {
        date: '2016-05-01',
        title: '今天天气好',
        author: '大哥'
      }, {
        date: '2016-05-08',
        title: '今天天气好',
        author: '大哥'
      }, {
        date: '2016-05-06',
        title: '今天天气好',
        author: '大哥'
      }, {
        date: '2016-05-07',
        title: '今天天气好',
        author: '大哥'
      }],
      multipleSelection: []
    }
  },

  methods: {
    toggleSelection (rows) {
      if (rows) {
        rows.forEach(row => {
          this.$refs.multipleTable.toggleRowSelection(row)
        })
      } else {
        this.$refs.multipleTable.clearSelection()
      }
    },
    handleSelectionChange (val) {
      this.multipleSelection = val
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
